name: Avoid classes having a  number of public methods and attributes exceeds maximum (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the classes with too many public methods and attributes.
output:
"This report lists all the classes with too many public methods and attributes.

This QR provides the following information:
Class full name."
rationale: A large number of public methods and attributes declared in a class can indicate that the class may need to be broken up as increased effort will be required to thoroughly test it.
remediation: Modify the source code of the class to reduce the number of public methods and attributes.
